statements: UPDATE website_traffic_data SET duration_sec = 60 WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_visited = 'home'
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 456 AND page_visited = 'about us'
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET duration_sec = 1000 WHERE user_id = 101 AND page_visited = 'Home'
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET timestamp = '2022-09-30 08:00:00' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_views = 100 WHERE user_id = 123 AND date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE user_engagement SET total_sessions = 5, last_activity_date = '2022-03-20' WHERE user_id = 456 AND email = 'example@email.com';
UPDATE website_traffic_data SET page_views = 100, time_spent = 5.6 WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_url = 'https://example.com'
UPDATE user_engagement SET total_sessions = total_sessions + 1, last_activity_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE website_visits SET device_type = 'Desktop' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activity SET total_engagement_time = '2 hours' WHERE user_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE website_visits SET device_type = 'Mobile' WHERE user_id = 'ef7c91ac-45e2-4eef-a52c-886d64f522a2';
UPDATE page_data SET unique_visitors = 500, avg_engagement_time = '1 hour 30 minutes' WHERE page_url = '/home';
UPDATE website_visits SET visit_duration = '1 hour' WHERE visit_id = 123;
UPDATE visitor_demographics SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE website_visits SET visit_duration = '01:30:00' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE visitor_demographics SET location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE website_users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE page_views SET view_date = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE page_id = 5;
UPDATE website_users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE page_views SET page_name='Updated Page Name', view_date=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id=2;
